text: chaahie ki samaee (saamarthy) vaala apanee samaee ke anusaar kharch kare aur jise usakee rozee napee-tulee milee ho to use chaahie ki allaah ne use jo kuchh bhee diya hai usee mein se vah kharch kare. jitana kuchh diya hai usase badhakar allaah kisee vyakti par zimmedaaree ka bojh nahin daalata. jald hee allaah kathinaee ke baad aasaanee paida kar dega
